title: Investigating the influence of Cu and Ti substitution on the structural, optical, and dielectric properties of BiFeO3
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14080-14090
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01850H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
A. Ouertani, Z. Abdelkafi, H. Khemakhem, N. Randrianantoandro
The environmentally friendly BiFe1−x(Ti1/2Cu1/2)xO3 system with various substitution rates, including x = 0 (BFO), x = 0.02 (BFTCO2) and x = 0.04 (BFTCO4), has been synthesized using the solid-state reaction technique.
